New Records: Freddie Freeman hit the first ever walk-off grand slam in the World Series history
Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman's walk-off grand slam in the tenth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Freddie Freeman's performance in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers (98–64) and Yankees (94–68) each held the best records in their respective leagues this season
Others: The game went into extra innings before Freddie Freeman's walk-off grand slam
